Vendor Terms and Conditions

  • Eligibility: Vendors must be legally registered businesses or individuals authorized to provide services.
  • Service Quality: Vendors must ensure the quality of services provided aligns with their descriptions on the platform.
  • Pricing and Payments: Vendors must set accurate prices. Any additional fees must be clearly stated upfront.
  • Booking and Cancellations: Vendors agree to accept and fulfill confirmed bookings. Any cancellations must be communicated in advance.
  • Refund Policy: Vendors must clearly define refund policies and adhere to them in case of cancellations or disputes.
  • Content Accuracy: Vendors are responsible for maintaining accurate service descriptions, pricing, and availability.
  • Legal Compliance: Vendors must comply with all local laws, licenses, and regulations related to their services.
  • Dispute Resolution: Any disputes between vendors and customers should be resolved professionally. The platform may mediate if necessary.
  • Commission and Fees: Vendors agree to pay applicable commissions or platform service fees as per the agreement.
  • Account Termination: The platform reserves the right to suspend or terminate vendor accounts for fraud, misconduct, or policy violations.
